title: Ostin Tech Stock Plunged 88% in a Cautionary Tale for IPO Investors - Barron's
content: Ostin Tech Stock Plunged 88% in a Cautionary Tale for IPO Investors  Barron's
description: Before Thursday's plunge, Ostin Technology Group, a Chinese supplier of display modules, posted the best first-day pop for an initial public offering this year on Wednesday.
